Package agile.planner.scripter

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • agile.planner.scripter.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardState, CheckListState, DayState, EditState, ExportState, ImportState, LabelState, PreProcessorState, PrintState, RemoveState, ScheduleState, TaskState, UpdateState
    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract State for holding all core data (e.g. stack, heap, etc.) for the scripting language

      • processArguments

        protected java.lang.String[] processArguments​(java.lang.String line,
                                              int maxArgs,
                                              java.lang.String delimiter)
        Processes arguments to a class or function in the script
        Parameters:
        line - line of code being processed
        maxArgs - maximum number of tokens possible
        delimiter - pattern for separating tokens
        Returns:
        string array of all arguments
